Regulation Name(s): Culture Media, Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test, Excluding Mueller Hinton Agar
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for chromID™ VRE Agar, a selective chromogenic medium for qualitative detection of vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus faecium and faecalis in stool specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Aid for qualitative detection of vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus faecium and E. faecalis in stool specimens to identify, prevent, and control VRE colonization in healthcare settings; not intended for diagnosis or guiding treatment
